dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HRES 741 IH: Disapproving of the President’s expression of intent to expand amnesty to undocumented immigrants through Executive order after the 2014 congressional midterm elections.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Olson submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: Disapproving of the President’s expression of intent to expand amnesty to undocumented immigrants through Executive order after the 2014 congressional midterm elections.

section.text: That the House of Representatives disapproves of the President’s expression of intent to expand amnesty to undocumented immigrants through Executive order after the 2014 congressional midterm elections.
